author: deguio
body:
#### PR description:
A geometry analyzer is added to help with the validation of the evolving HGC geometry.
- possibility to run different geometries
- summary text file of the transition regions between different sensor types for CEE and CEH
- script to produce plots like the ones [here](http://deguio.web.cern.ch/deguio/hgcal/geometry/geom_output_v10_D41/)

@rovere @bsunanda @cseez @pfs
title: add geometry analyzer for quick validation
